---@class BattleRenderCharacter
local BattleRenderCharacter = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleRenderCharacter:initialize(data)

    self._go_model = data.go_model
    ---@type string
    self._index = data.index

    self._heroId = data.heroId

    self:init()

end

function BattleRenderCharacter:init()

    self._animatorSystem = AnimatorSystem:new(self._go_model)
    --self._effectSystem = EffectSystem:new()
    --self._audioSystem = AudioSystem:new()
end

function BattleRenderCharacter:handleMsg(msgType,msg,data)

end

function BattleRenderCharacter:handleMsg(msgType,msg,data)

end

return BattleRenderCharacter
